```{r}
setwd("D:/LianZuo/2022 Fall/STAT 563 - Statistical Data Analysis(Islam)/563-HW")
dat <- read.table("testscore.txt",header = T)
attach(dat)
names(dat)
head(dat)
n=nrow(dat) #sample size
ncol(dat)
p=5 #number of parameters
m <- lm(final~exam1+exam2+exam3+homework,data=dat)
m
#a
coef(m)
#b
vcov(m)
#c
cov(homework,exam2)
#d
TSS=with(dat, sum((final-mean(final))^2))
ESS=sum(resid(m)^2)
RSS=TSS-ESS
c(TSS, RSS, ESS)
dfT=n-1
dfR=p-1
dfE=n-p
list=c(TSS=TSS, RSS=RSS, ESS=ESS, dfT=dfT, dfR=dfR, dfE=dfE)
print(list)
#e
R2.1=1-ESS/TSS
R2.2=RSS/TSS
c(R2.1, R2.2)
MTSS=TSS/dfT
MRSS=RSS/dfR
MESS=ESS/dfE
adjR2=1-MESS/MTSS
adjR2
#f
summary(m)
summary(m)$r.squared
summary(m)$adj.r.squared
#h
logL=as.numeric(logLik(m))
AIC1=2*(p-logL)+p/2
BIC1=(p+1)*log(n)-2*logL
c(AIC1, BIC1)
#i
AIC2=AIC(m)         
BIC2=BIC(m)    
c(AIC2, BIC2)
#h
F=((TSS-ESS)/(p-1))/(ESS/(n-p))
F
# p-value: < 2.2e-16, conclusion in regard to the  rejection of the null hypothesis at Î±=0.05.
```
